title: rito fix this right now
body:
I haven't been able to find{{champion:34}} on the champion select screen for quite some time now. as a dedicated Light Blue Square main since season 3, I demand that you put him back in the game, and give him more damage on his passive and q. I don't mind if you make the fear shorter to compensate. and sometimes the attach is buggy. (insert other obscure mechanics here)
I expect some good QoL changes for my boy {{champion:34}}

replies.body: You know how hard it is to balance him! If you give him any buffs he'll be oppressive and no fun to play against!
i mean all you have to do to beat him in lane is buy{{item:3632}} or {{item:3104}}
Oh htose items are broken and you know it. You can only say you're good at the game if you could beat him before the nerfs without using those items.

{{item:3632}} will always be broken, since it cancels spell vamp, but if it is removed they would have to gut {{champion:34}} .
as a {{champion:34}} main i can easily win lane with {{item:3137}} first item rush on ao shin if someone picks him from me.
True. But you have to remember that Ao shin has been op for two seasons now. Only so long before riot hits him with the nerf bat.
who tf is anivia, no one cares about that garbage champ. i just want {{champion:34}} to be numero uno again
